P

PicoActionFactory - Class in org.picocontainer.web.webwork
Replacement for the standard WebWork JavaActionFactory that uses a PicoContainer to resolve all of the dependencies an Action may have.
PicoActionFactory() - Constructor for class org.picocontainer.web.webwork.PicoActionFactory
 
PicoActionFactory.ServletFilter - Class in org.picocontainer.web.webwork
 
PicoActionFactory.ServletFilter() - Constructor for class org.picocontainer.web.webwork.PicoActionFactory.ServletFilter
 
PicoWebWork1ServletDispatcher - Class in org.picocontainer.web.webwork
Extension to the standard WebWork 1 ServletDispatcher that instantiates a new container in the request scope for each request and disposes of it correctly at the end of the request.
PicoWebWork1ServletDispatcher() - Constructor for class org.picocontainer.web.webwork.PicoWebWork1ServletDispatcher
